description: Retrieve a paginated list of confirmed stock exits. Includes generated documents (BL).

queryParams.articleId: Optional. Filter by a specific article ID.
queryParams.chantierId: Optional. Filter by a specific chantier (site) code.
queryParams.compteId: Optional. Filter by the ID of the user (magazinier) who created the exit.
queryParams.stockSortie: Optional. Filter exits containing a specific quantity.

response.sorties: Array of confirmed Sortie objects including relations and documents.
response.count: Number of items in the current page.
response.lastPage: Boolean indicating if this is the last page.
